content.question: Which of the following best describes the behavior of the  mystery  method?

choices.label: It repeatedly prints the value  j  due to infinite recursion.
It prints the initial value of  j  a total of  k  times.
It prints the integers from  j  to  k,  inclusive, in order from least to greatest.
It prints the integers from  j  to  k,  inclusive, in order from greatest to least.

content.answer: It prints the integers from  j  to  k,  inclusive, in order from least to greatest.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
